```{r}
datas <- read.csv("./bus_signals.csv", header=T)
```
```{r}
plot(datas$timestamp, datas$accelerator_pedal, type='l')
plot(datas$timestamp, datas$brake_pressure, type='l')
```

```{r}
plot(datas$distance_pulse_front_right, datas$distance_pulse_rear_right, type='p')
plot(datas$distance_pulse_front_left, datas$distance_pulse_rear_left, type='p')
plot(datas$distance_pulse_front_left, datas$distance_pulse_front_right, type='p')
plot(datas$distance_pulse_rear_left, datas$distance_pulse_rear_right, type='p')
```
